title: A Pentacamera masterpiece and Google Pixel Perks
description: We’ve got a ton of housecleaning to do and C. Scott Brown joins Adam and Jonathan to do it. The Google Pixel 4 gets a crazy Black Friday deal. Astro mode comes to older Pixel phones, Google Play Points and custom ringtones galore. Plus, we look at Fossil’s new hybrid smartwatch, Xiaomi’s 5-camera wonder, and the Uncarrier is at it again. All this and so much more on the Android Authority Podcast! Tech We Like: DJI Mavic MiniVisit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast. This podcast is sponsored by MNML Cases. Order a sweet, thin case for your phone and get 25% off. Use code AAPodcast at checkout or click this link. https://mnmlcase.com/discount/aapodcast Recorded November 8, 2019 Topics: Target Black Friday Pixel 4 deal offers $300 in gift cards You can now shoot those awesome night sky photos with your Pixel 3 and Pixel 3a Gallery: Here’s what the Pixel 4’s Astro mode can do Google Play Points rewards program launched in the US: Here’s how it works Gallery: Here’s what the world’s first 108MP camera can do Do you use custom ringtones? DJI Mavic Mini hands-on: The perfect drone for people who haven’t used a drone Hands-on: Fossil hybrid smartwatch has an always-on display and lasts 2+ weeks T-Mobile unveils new $15 plan, free connectivity for students, first responders Xiaomi Mi Note 10 review: A photographer’s Swiss Army knife The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Special guest appearance by: Scott Brown - @C_scottbrown Produced by Adam Doud Check out the other podcasts in our network! html:
Nov 9, 2019

We’ve got a ton of housecleaning to do and C. Scott Brown joins Adam and Jonathan to do it. The Google Pixel 4 gets a crazy Black Friday deal. Astro mode comes to older Pixel phones, Google Play Points and custom ringtones galore. Plus, we look at Fossil’s new hybrid smartwatch, Xiaomi’s 5-camera wonder, and the Uncarrier is at it again. All this and so much more on the Android Authority Podcast!

Tech We Like: DJI Mavic Mini
Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks

Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast.

This podcast is sponsored by MNML Cases. Order a sweet, thin case for your phone and get 25% off. Use code AAPodcast at checkout or click this link.

https://mnmlcase.com/discount/aapodcast

Recorded November 8, 2019

Topics:

Target Black Friday Pixel 4 deal offers $300 in gift cards

You can now shoot those awesome night sky photos with your Pixel 3 and Pixel 3a

Gallery: Here’s what the Pixel 4’s Astro mode can do

Google Play Points rewards program launched in the US: Here’s how it works

Gallery: Here’s what the world’s first 108MP camera can do

Do you use custom ringtones?

DJI Mavic Mini hands-on: The perfect drone for people who haven’t used a drone

Hands-on: Fossil hybrid smartwatch has an always-on display and lasts 2+ weeks

T-Mobile unveils new $15 plan, free connectivity for students, first responders

Xiaomi Mi Note 10 review: A photographer’s Swiss Army knife

The Android Authority podcast is:

Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology

Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom

Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy

Special guest appearance by:

Scott Brown - @C_scottbrown

Produced by Adam Doud

Check out the other podcasts in our network!
